title: Don your aprons and fire up the ovens!

replies.body: Why the fuck did i read Pantheon as a cute anime girl
LMAO
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Don your aprons and fire up the ovens! -THE JEWS ARE HERE!
Roasted
Omg please change pantheons spear to either a rolling pin or a bagguette, that would make this skin perfect.

Oh my god it's some kind of fel portal into old MSN group RP logs.

I can feel the OWO What's this? overtaking me.
what the hell riot?
{{champion:80}} Pantheon can finally Bake....The Dream is real
**I REALLY WANTED A WARD SKIN AND ICONS FOR THIS :( :( **
so,morg got eaten{{champion:25}}
Yep, she didn't bake well enough LOL

Snow-day skin ideas
-Sexy Santa Taric
-Reindeer Hecarim
-Nutcracker Teemo
-Ugly Christmas Sweater Ezreal
Please make my dreams ezREAL riot.

omg my brother cooks meat cakes (well, full sized pies, but still)!

literally, he takes bacon, gravy, cheese, beef, onions and oil, cooks them together then puts it in bread dough like a normal pie except the fruit is meat, then puts that in the oven.
Lmao "you can naver have too much meat sunshinn"
4 dmg taken off ekkos auto? am i reading that right? lux more cc? im already regretting coming back for this patch

when the bread is just right.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} 
I`ve been waiting my entire league career for this. Thank you riot, from the bottom of my wallet.

Baker Pantheon. I would have him with an oven tray as a shield and tossing french bread sticks. I'm a little disappointed. This was legendary skin material and the job seems sloppy. Not even voice or taunt changes. Come on RITO Pantheon has achieved his life dream, he should act differently. He deserves better
This reeks of Shokugeki no Soma references.. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

livin the dream

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

He baked cake for me when no one else could {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

His dreams of being a baker have become a reality ^_^
